content.question: Peasant men in seventeenth- and eighteenth-century Europe generally married in their late twenties primarily because

choices.label: they had to spend a period of time in the military
they were required to finish their apprenticeships
there were more women than men
they wanted to first establish independent households

content.answer: they wanted to first establish independent households

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
